pages.title: Looting Charm
pages.text: Wearing $(key)Looting Charms$() grants access to special resources.$(br2)$(welcome/emi#ru)Check uses$() on $(key)Looting Charms$() to see their extra loot effects.$(br2)Compared to $(bold)burning conversion$() and completing $(bold)specific challenges$(), wearing $(key)Looting Charms$() is the easiest way to obtain resources.
